app.name: Louez.io
app.description: Simple and modern equipment rental platform

addressModal.title: Address details
addressModal.description: Adjust the position on the map and customize the displayed address
addressModal.mapHint: Click or drag the marker to adjust the position
addressModal.displayAddressHint: This address will be shown to your customers
addressModal.additionalInfoHint: Extra details to help your customers find you
addressModal.additionalInfoPlaceholder: e.g., Building B, 2nd floor, door code 1234

auth.codeSentTo: A verification code has been sent to
auth.loginDescription: Enter your email to continue. If you don't have an account, one will be created for you.
auth.linkWillBeSent: A secure link will be sent to your email. No password to remember.
auth.heroSubtitle: The all-in-one platform for rental professionals. Create your online store, manage your reservations and grow your business.
auth.trustedBy: Join hundreds of rental professionals who trust us
auth.emailSentTo: A login link has been sent to
auth.clickLinkToSignIn: Click the link in the email to sign in. The link expires in 24 hours.
auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to our

verifyRequest.title: Check your email
verifyRequest.description: A login link has been sent to your email address.
verifyRequest.checkSpam: Click the link in the email to sign in. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

errors.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use
errors.accountNotLinked: An account already exists with this email. Please sign in with your email.
errors.oauthError: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission to sign in.
errors.verification: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
errors.default: An error occurred. Please try again.

invitation.inviteToJoin: {name} invites you to join the team
invitation.readyToJoin: You are logged in and ready to join the {storeName} team.
invitation.accessDescription: By accepting, you will have access to the dashboard to manage reservations, products, and customers.
invitation.loginRequired: Log in or create an account with this email address to accept the invitation.
invitation.emailMismatchDescription: This invitation was sent to {invitedEmail}, but you are logged in as {currentEmail}.
invitation.emailMismatchHint: Log out and log in with the invitation email address.
invitation.expiredDescription: This invitation has expired. Ask the administrator to send you a new invitation.
invitation.usedDescription: This invitation has already been used or cancelled.
invitation.loginHint: If you don't have an account, you can create one during login.

notifications.newReservationDescription: A new reservation request has arrived

team.title: Team
team.addMemberDescription: Invite a team member to join your store by email
team.addMemberHint: If the user already has a Louez account, they will be added directly. Otherwise, they will receive an invitation by email.
team.pendingInvitationsDescription: These people have not yet accepted their invitation
team.invitationAlreadySent: An invitation has already been sent to this email
team.alreadyMember: This user is already a member of this store
team.userNotFound: User not found. This person must first create a Louez account.
team.limitReached: You have reached the team member limit for your plan.
team.featureNotAvailableDescription: Team members are not included in your current plan. Upgrade to Pro to invite members to join your team.
team.limitReachedDescription: You are using {current} out of {limit} team members. Upgrade to add more.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.description: Invite other rental businesses and track your referrals.

link.title: Refer & earn
link.description: Share your link and invite other rental businesses to join Louez.
link.reward: For each referred rental business, get 3 free months on the Ultra plan.

list.title: Your referrals
list.count: {count, plural, =0 {No referrals} one {1 referral} other {# referrals}}
list.emptyDescription: Share your referral link to get started. Businesses that sign up using your link will appear here.

quota.title: Monthly SMS Quota
quota.description: Resets on the 1st of each month
quota.upgradeMessage: You have reached your monthly SMS limit. Upgrade to a higher plan to continue sending SMS.
quota.topupMessage: You've reached your monthly limit. Top up to continue sending SMS.

topup.title: Top up your SMS credits
topup.description: Credits never expire and add to your monthly quota
topup.info: Credits are added immediately after payment
topup.success: Top up successful! Your credits have been added.
topup.cancelled: Payment was cancelled. Your credits were not charged.
topup.notAvailable: SMS top-up is not available for the Start plan. Upgrade to Pro or Ultra to top up.

errors.notEligible: Your plan does not allow SMS top-up

upsell.ultraBenefit: With Ultra, pay only {price} per SMS and get {count} SMS included every month.
upsell.startDescription: Send automatic notifications to your customers

chart.title: Revenue trend
chart.description: Revenue by store over the period

empty.title: No data yet

pricingTiers.enableTiersDescription: Offer automatic discounts for longer rentals

pricingTiers.previewTooltip: Discounts are automatically applied based on rental duration
pricingTiers.enforceStrictTiersDescription: Customers will only be able to book for the exact durations defined by your tiers. Intermediate durations will not be available.
pricingTiers.enforceStrictTiersTooltip: If a customer selects an intermediate duration, it will be automatically rounded up to the next tier. For example, with tiers at 3 and 7 days, a 5-day rental will be billed at the 7-day rate.

deposit.title: Deposit (Authorization Hold)
deposit.description: Manage the deposit authorization hold for this reservation
deposit.pendingDescription: Payment was received but the card could not be saved for the deposit. You will need to collect the deposit manually or ask the customer to provide a card.
deposit.cardSavedDescription: The customer's card is saved. You can create a hold to block the deposit amount.
deposit.authorizedDescription: The deposit amount is held on the customer's card. You can capture it for damages or release it at the end of the rental.
deposit.capturedDescription: The deposit amount has been captured from the customer's card.
deposit.releasedDescription: The authorization has been released, no charges were made.
deposit.failedDescription: The authorization failed. The customer may need to use a different card.
deposit.captureDescription: Capture all or part of the deposit to cover damages or losses.
deposit.captureReasonPlaceholder: Describe the damages or reason for capture...
deposit.captureReasonHint: This reason will be recorded in the history and visible to the customer.
deposit.releaseDescription: Are you sure you want to release the {amount} deposit? The authorization will be cancelled and no charges will be made.

paymentBadge.depositFullyReturned: The deposit has been fully returned

export.title: Export to calendar
export.description: Sync your reservations with your favorite calendar by copying the link below.

google.step2: Click the + next to "Other calendars" then "From URL"

apple.step1: Open the Calendar app on Mac or iPhone
apple.step2: File > New Calendar Subscription (Mac) or Add Account > Other > Add Subscribed Calendar (iOS)

outlook.step3: Paste the link and give the calendar a name

legalSettings.tip4: Mention insurance and liability in case of damage
legalSettings.tip5: Don't hesitate to consult a lawyer to validate your documents

taxes.displayModeExclusiveDescription: Displayed prices exclude tax. Recommended for business customers (B2B).

taxes.depositNoTaxInfo: Deposits are not subject to VAT as they are returned to the customer.

prompt.returnDescription: Check the equipment condition upon return.

smartActions.inspectionRequiredDescription: An inspection is required before proceeding.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Configure online payments for your store
payments.stripeConnectDescription: Accept credit card payments directly on your store
payments.notConnectedDescription: Connect your Stripe account to accept online payments. You will be redirected to Stripe to complete the setup.
payments.activeDescription: Your Stripe account is connected and operational. You can accept online payments.
payments.incompleteDescription: Your Stripe setup is incomplete. Please complete the setup to accept payments.
payments.disconnectDescription: You will no longer be able to accept online payments. Existing payments will not be affected.

callback.successDescription: Your Stripe account is now connected. You can accept online payments.
callback.incompleteDescription: Some information is missing. You can complete the setup later.

refresh.title: Link Expired
refresh.description: The setup link has expired. Please try again from settings.

flowExplanation.title: Reservation flow
flowExplanation.subtitle: Here's what your customers experience based on your settings

steps.youReview: You receive an email and review the request
steps.acceptOrReject: You accept or decline the request
steps.paymentOnlineOrSite: Customer pays online from their account or on-site
steps.bothNotified: You and the customer receive confirmation

enableStripe.title: Accept online payments
enableStripe.description: Enable Stripe to let customers pay by card. You can also send payment links via email or SMS.

instantPayment.title: Switch to instant payment?
instantPayment.description: To fully automate your reservations, enable instant payment mode in your store settings.

noStripeWithPayment.title: Incomplete configuration
noStripeWithPayment.description: Instant payment mode is enabled but Stripe is not configured. Customers won't be able to complete reservations.

info.requestWithStripe: Once the request is accepted, your customer can pay online from their account. You can also send a payment link via email or SMS, or collect payment on-site.
info.instantPayment: Optimal setup! Your reservations are fully automated. Payment immediately secures the reservation.

requestMode.title: Need manual validation?
requestMode.description: Request mode lets you review each reservation before collecting payment. Adjustable in store settings.

subscriptionSettings.title: Subscription
subscriptionSettings.helpText: Contact our team for any questions about subscriptions.

accountSettings.title: My account
accountSettings.name: Name
accountSettings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all your data
accountSettings.deleteAccountWarning: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.

admin.title: Platform Admin
admin.description: Platform-level settings for this store. Only visible to platform administrators.
admin.trialSectionDescription: Configure a free trial period for this store's subscription.
admin.trialDaysDescription: Number of free trial days when this store subscribes to a paid plan. Set to 0 for no trial (immediate payment).
admin.discountSectionDescription: Configure a discount on this store's subscription.
admin.discountPercentDescription: The discount applied to the subscription price (0-100%).
admin.discountDurationDescription: Number of months the discount applies. Set to 0 for a permanent discount.

home.categoriesDesc: Explore our product selection by category

success.confirmedDescription: Your payment has been accepted. You will receive a confirmation email.
success.pendingDescription: Your reservation has been created and is awaiting payment confirmation.
success.depositSavedDescription: Your card has been saved. An authorization hold of {amount} will be placed when you pick up. No amount will be charged if everything is returned in good condition.

checkout.lineNeedsUpdateInline: This line is no longer available. Update quantity or attributes.

confirmation.title: Reservation confirmed!

confirmation.stepRequest1: We are reviewing your reservation request

confirmation.stepPayment1: You will receive a confirmation email with details

authorizeDeposit.title: Deposit authorization

authorizeDeposit.step2: The amount is not charged to your account
authorizeDeposit.step3: At the end of the rental, the authorization is automatically cancelled
authorizeDeposit.step4: In case of damage, part or all may be charged
authorizeDeposit.infoBox: This amount will not be charged. It will be temporarily held on your card and released when you return the equipment in good condition.
authorizeDeposit.paymentInitError: Unable to initialize payment. Please try again later.

success.title: Deposit authorized!
success.description: The amount of {amount} has been temporarily held on your card.
success.willBeReleased: This amount will be automatically released at the end of your rental if the equipment is returned in good condition. No charge will be made unless there is damage.

errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. The amount could not be held.
errors.invalidCard: Invalid card. Please check the information entered.

verificationCode.title: Login code
verificationCode.body: Here is your login code to access your account on {storeName}:
verificationCode.expiry: This code expires in 10 minutes. If you didn't request this code, you can safely ignore this email.

confirmReservation.subject: Your reservation #{number} is confirmed
confirmReservation.title: Reservation confirmed!
confirmReservation.body: Your reservation #{number} is confirmed. Here is the summary:

requestReceived.subject: Reservation request #{number} received
requestReceived.title: Request received
requestReceived.body: We have received your reservation request.
requestReceived.review: Our team is reviewing your request and will get back to you shortly.
requestReceived.confirmation: You will receive a confirmation email once your reservation is validated.

requestAccepted.subject: Your request #{number} has been accepted!
requestAccepted.title: Request accepted!
requestAccepted.body: Good news! Your reservation request #{number} has been accepted.
requestAccepted.signContract: Don't forget to sign your rental contract before picking up your equipment.

requestRejected.subject: Reservation request #{number}
requestRejected.title: Request not accepted
requestRejected.body: We're sorry, your reservation request #{number} could not be accepted.
requestRejected.contactForAlternative: Please contact us for more information or to find an alternative that might suit you.

reminderPickup.subject: Reminder: your rental starts tomorrow!
reminderPickup.title: Your rental starts tomorrow!
reminderPickup.body: This is a reminder for your reservation #{number}.

reminderReturn.subject: Reminder: equipment return today
reminderReturn.title: Remember to return your equipment
reminderReturn.body: This is a reminder for your reservation #{number}. The equipment return is scheduled for today.
reminderReturn.returnInfo: Please return the equipment in good condition. The deposit will be returned after verification.

thankYouReview.subject: Thank you for your rental!
thankYouReview.title: Thank you for your trust!
thankYouReview.body: We hope your rental went well. Your review helps us improve and helps other customers make their choice.
thankYouReview.disclaimer: It only takes a minute and would be a great help!

newRequestLandlord.subject: New reservation request #{number}
newRequestLandlord.title: New reservation request
newRequestLandlord.body: You have received a new request on {storeName}.
newRequestLandlord.connectToManage: Log in to your dashboard to accept or reject this request.

teamInvitation.subject: {inviterName} invites you to join {storeName}
teamInvitation.title: Team invitation
teamInvitation.body: {inviterName} invites you to join the {storeName} team on Louez.io.
teamInvitation.accessDescription: By accepting this invitation, you will have access to the store dashboard to manage reservations, products, and customers.
teamInvitation.expiry: This invitation expires in 7 days. If you did not request to join this team, you can safely ignore this email.

baseLayout.ignoreIfNotYou: If you did not initiate this action, please ignore this email.

instantAccess.subject: Access your reservation #{number}
instantAccess.title: Access your reservation
instantAccess.paymentPending: Payment is pending for this reservation.
instantAccess.linkValid: This link is valid for 30 days.

reservationCancelled.subject: Reservation #{number} cancelled
reservationCancelled.title: Reservation cancelled
reservationCancelled.contactForQuestions: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

reservationCompleted.subject: Reservation #{number} completed
reservationCompleted.title: Rental completed!
reservationCompleted.depositReturned: Your deposit of {amount} will be refunded.
reservationCompleted.depositPending: Your deposit of {amount} will be verified and refunded shortly.
reservationCompleted.thankYouMessage: Thank you for choosing our services!

paymentConfirmation.subject: Payment confirmed - Reservation #{number}
paymentConfirmation.title: Payment received!
paymentConfirmation.body: We have received your payment for reservation #{number}.
paymentConfirmation.confirmation: Your payment has been successfully processed.
paymentConfirmation.keepEmail: Keep this email as proof of payment.

paymentFailed.subject: Payment failed - Reservation #{number}
paymentFailed.title: Payment failed
paymentFailed.body: The payment of {amount} for your reservation #{number} could not be processed.
paymentFailed.tip1: Check that your card is valid and has sufficient funds
paymentFailed.tip3: Contact your bank if the problem persists

paymentRequest.subject: Payment requested for reservation #{number}
paymentRequest.title: Payment request
paymentRequest.body: {storeName} is requesting a payment of {amount} for your reservation #{number}.
paymentRequest.linkFallback: Or copy this link into your browser:
paymentRequest.securePayment: This payment is secured by Stripe. Your payment information is never shared with the rental provider.

depositAuthorizationRequest.subject: Deposit authorization for reservation #{number}
depositAuthorizationRequest.title: Deposit authorization required
depositAuthorizationRequest.body: {storeName} is requesting a deposit authorization of {amount} for your reservation #{number}.
depositAuthorizationRequest.step1: You authorize the deposit amount on your card
depositAuthorizationRequest.step2: The amount is temporarily held (not charged)
depositAuthorizationRequest.step3: At the end of the rental, the authorization is automatically released
depositAuthorizationRequest.step4: In case of damage, part or all may be charged
depositAuthorizationRequest.linkFallback: Or copy this link into your browser:
depositAuthorizationRequest.securePayment: This authorization is secured by Stripe. The amount will not be charged immediately.

baseLayout.ignoreIfNotYou: If you did not initiate this action, please ignore this email.

signature.landlordText: The landlord certifies the accuracy of the above information and the availability of the equipment for the indicated period.
signature.customerText: I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the general rental terms and conditions without reservation.

conditions.condition1: The equipment is rented in good working order
conditions.condition2: The tenant agrees to return the equipment in the condition in which it was received
conditions.condition3: In case of damage or loss, the deposit may be retained in whole or in part

legal.text1: This document serves as a rental contract and invoice. It attests to the agreement between the parties for the rental of the equipment described above under the conditions mentioned.
legal.text2: In case of late payment, late payment penalties at the legal rate in force will be applied. Fixed compensation for recovery costs: 40 euros.
legal.tvaNotApplicable: VAT not applicable, art. 293 B of the CGI

validation.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date

validation.invalidYoutubeUrl: The YouTube URL is not valid
validation.invalidImageUrl: The image URL is not valid
